name: Roto (DeadPixel)
description:
A game made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 34 - Two Button Controls

Collect as many coins as you can and reach the goal without hitting spikes or being crushed!

CONTROLS

  • Left Arrow: Rotate left
  • Right Arrow: Rotate right

REQUIREMENTS

  • Java 6+
  • OpenGL 2.0+ compatible graphics card
